G

GameLogic - Class in chess
This class controls the logic for the chess game such as verifying moves and identifying checkmates and stalemates.
GameLogic() - Constructor for class chess.GameLogic
Creates a new instance of the logic.
GameOverDialog - Class in chess
This class is used to create a pop up window to display the results when the game has concluded.
